text: 21:3 Eze 37:27; Levi 26:11,12Amasung phambal adudagi ahouba khonjel amana asumna hairakpa eina tare, â€œYeng-u! Tengban Mapugi leipham adu houjikti misinggi marakta leirare, aduga Ibungo mahakna makhoiga leiminnagani. Makhoi Ibungo magi mising oigani, aduga Tengban Mapu masamakna makhoiga leiminnagani aduga mahak makhoigi Tengban Mapu oigani.
